Name: Average time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and SW-Reviewer Agreed across all variants where both activities occur
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time it takes SW-Reviewer Agreed to be performed after Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average waiting time to SW-Reviewer Agreed following Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Time elapsed from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in variants that include a successful reviewer agreement
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Average time for the segment starting at Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and ending at SW-Reviewer Agreed, compared to the segment from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 to SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total resolution time of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 defined as the duration until the next occurrence of SW-Reviewer Agreed or SW-Reviewer No Response
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and SW-Reviewer No Response in cases where agreement was not reached
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer No Response'

Name: Average time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to SW-AE Assign Reviewers when a new reviewer is assigned after the reminder
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Elapsed time between Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and the subsequent occurrence of Assign a Different Editor in complex variant paths
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'Assign a Different Editor'

Name: Time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation in variants that eventually reach editorial recommendation
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Average cycle time of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 measured from its timestamp to the timestamp of the next decisive activity (SW-Reviewer Agreed, SW-Reviewer Declined, or SW-Reviewer No Response)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time from Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation in variants involving major or minor revisions
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Average time it takes SW-Reviewer Agreed to occur after Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2, specifically in variants that previously included SW-Reviewer Selection is 1 week late
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
